text: Penicillium multicolor is an anamorph species of the genus Penicillium which produces alpha-L-fucosidase, tilactase, sclerotiorin, 8-O-Methylsclerotiorinamine, multicolosic acid and isochromophilones.UniProtATCC == Further reading == * * * * * * * * == References == multicolor Category:Fungi described in 1915
title: Penicillium multicolor
